A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi takes Star Wars to places it has never been. It defies expectations\, fearlessly embracing its complicated galaxy with themes never acknowledged before. It is perhaps the first Star Wars film brave enough to change the way you comprehend the Force and the Jedi. This is not the safe\, nostalgic reboot of The Force Awakens\, but rather a surprising new chapter that stands out as one of the most unique tales in the Star Wars canon.
